options.optionText: Hey, Diana, I uh... need a favor.
options.responseText: Mmm, a favor, huh? That sounds dangerous coming from you. What is it? Spit it out before I get bored.

followUpOptions.optionText: I’m, uh, collecting something for a... vault experiment. You know, science stuff. Can I get your... um... panties?
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh, panties? Well, I do love a man of research... but no. If anyone’s gonna be experimenting with my panties, it's me. Nice try though.

followUpOptions.optionText: You know, I’m just asking for... a piece of fabric. Nothing too weird, right?
followUpOptions.responseText: A piece of fabric? Sweetie, that’s the most roundabout way I’ve ever heard someone ask for my underwear. What’s next, you wanna borrow my bra too?

followUpOptions.optionText: It’s for a, uh... friend. They dared me. Can I please just... get a pair?
followUpOptions.responseText: Look, I don’t know what kind of bet you lost, but there’s no way I’m handing over my panties just to save your sorry ass.

followUpOptions.optionText: Okay, fine, you got me. Someone in the vault... uh, asked me to get them. Don’t ask why.
followUpOptions.responseText: Ahh, so you’re the vault’s new delivery boy for pervs, huh? Cute. Well, you can go back and tell them that if they want my panties, they’ll have to do more than send a middleman. Like, I don’t know, maybe develop some self-respect.

followUpOptions.optionText: I figured you’d say no. Had to try though, right?
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh, I’m glad you tried. But, sweetie, I don’t hand out my panties like vault-issued jumpsuits. Keep dreaming.

followUpOptions.optionText: Come on, Diana, you know me. We’ve been through some shit. Just help me out?
followUpOptions.failedCheckResponse: Wow, bold move there. Maybe start with, like, a Vault-Tec manual on 'Basic Human Interaction' before you go straight for the weird stuff. Nice try, though. Points for... enthusiasm?
followUpOptions.responseText: *Laughs* Oh, fine. I guess you’ve earned it after all this time. You want me to strip right here? Fine. Enjoy the show, honey. ♥︎

options.responseText: Oh my... I knew you had good taste, but this? Darling, you've outdone yourself! Those are fabulous! Thank you!
Oh my... you really know how to satisfy a girl’s cravings. I’ve been waiting all day for someone to hand me a big, firm... dildo. Thank you.

options.optionText: Have you seen what’s happening? The vault turned into a full-on orgy!
options.responseText: Oh, you mean the 'Fapocalypse'? Yeah, I noticed. I had a front-row seat to the orgy at the Diner. Some guy used a pile of mashed potatoes as lube. Really brings a tear to your eye.

followUpOptions.optionText: I might’ve, uh… had a little something to do with that. I kinda helped the Fap Resistance Leader… y’know, distribute some, uh, fap material.
followUpOptions.responseText: So that’s why I found a vault-wide subscription to ‘Pre-War Buns Monthly’ under my door. I should’ve known you were involved. You’ve single-handedly turned this place from a nunnery to an adult film studio.

followUpOptions.optionText: So… you cool with all this chaos?
followUpOptions.responseText: Cool with it? Please. I’ve been waiting for this day since they handed me my first vault-issued chastity pamphlet. Watching the Purity Police scramble while people are literally fapping in the hallways? That’s the kind of poetic justice I live for.

options.responseText: Oh, this? Just a mix of coffee and the tears of people who try too hard. Thought you might want a sip, since you fit the demographic so well. Just kidding.

followUpOptions.responseText: When you've seen as much idiocy as I have, tears are basically a vitamin supplement. Keeps me from losing brain cells by proximity.
Water? Wow, living dangerously, I see.

options.responseText: A parade of incompetence, as usual. But I did manage to enjoy this lukewarm excuse for coffee, so that's something, I guess.

followUpOptions.optionText: Mind if I join you? [End Day]
followUpOptions.responseText: Only if you're planning on sitting there quietly.

options.optionText: So, what do you think about the food here?
options.responseText: Oh, you mean the flavorless sludge they have the nerve to call 'nutritionally balanced'? It’s like someone tried to make depression edible and somehow succeeded.

followUpOptions.responseText: Sure, if your definition of ‘healthy’ includes slowly wishing for death with every bite. Honestly, I think I’d get more nutrients licking the cafeteria floor.
Wow, desperate much? If watching me lick the floor is what gets you going, you’re beyond help.

followUpOptions.optionText: Come on, I bet you'd look great doing it.
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh, is that what you fantasize about at night? Me, bent over, licking the floor like some pre-war pin-up girl? Get a grip. I don’t do charity work, especially for guys who are one step away from licking the floor themselves.

followUpOptions.optionText: You’ve got to have better things to lick around here.
followUpOptions.responseText: Oh, I do, but trust me—you’d never get close enough to find out. Besides, you’d probably cum the second I unzipped this jumpsuit, and I’m not here to mop up your mess.

followUpOptions.optionText: What’s the best thing you’ve ever had to eat, then?
followUpOptions.responseText: Before this prison? I had this steak once—perfectly cooked, seasoned like it was crafted by the gods.

followUpOptions.optionText: Come on, it’s not *that* bad, right?
followUpOptions.responseText: Not that bad? It's *that* bad that they should label it ‘For External Use Only.’

options.responseText: Don’t let the vault door hit you on the way out.
